column3: Is it required to change the prototypes as well?\n
In prototypes, you do not need argument names at all, so I expect the change is not needed strictly speaking (edit: I have just verified this...). I did it just for consistency.\n
I don't think consistency is useful here; using full names is nicer for documentation purposes.\n
Agree with sipa: the real solution is to eliminate the global variable, not to use a less descriptive name here.\n
